alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 11:08PM EDT until July 11 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Contoocook River At Henniker affecting Hillsborough and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Contoocook River at Henniker. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, In the town of Hillsborough, Hennicker Street and Bear Hill Road flood. In Henniker, flood waters encroach on parts of Western Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning to 12.2 feet just after midnight tonight. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
